0:
---
modules:
  default:
    metrics:
    - name: mcc
      path: "{ .Aggregated_PerSecondStats.Samples }"
      help: Per-second stats aggregated over a minute
      labels:
        environment: test

routers:
- name: Oracle Cloud, Aus East
  network:
    name: oracle-aue
    display_name: oracle-aue
  nos: linux
  address: localhost
  port: 2222
  credential:
    username: ubuntu
    password: ubuntu
  vrfs:
  - name: global
    default: true
    ipv4:
      source_address: 192.0.2.1
    ipv6:
      source_address: 2001:db8::1

[core]
cache_dir = /cache
config_dir = /config
data_dir = /app

[logging]
verbosity = 0
format = %(levelname)-8s %(asctime)s [%(process)d:%(threadName)s] %(name)s\n  %(message)s
color = false
config_file =

[audio]
mixer = software
output = audioresample ! audioconvert ! audio/x-raw,rate=48000,channels=2,format=S16LE ! wavenc ! tcpclientsink host=${SVC_SNAPSERVER_ADDR} port=4955
mixer_volume = 45

[local]
library = sqlite
scan_flush_threshold = 100
media_dir = /media
scan_timeout = 4000
excluded_file_extensions =
.bmp
.cue
.png
.jpg
.jpeg
.doc
.docx
.nfo
.txt
.m3u
.sfv
.zip

[mpd]
hostname = 0.0.0.0
zeroconf = radio

[http]
enabled = true
hostname = 0.0.0.0
port = 6680
default_app = iris
zeroconf = radio
csrf_protection = false

[tidal]
enabled = false

[scrobbler]
enabled = false

[youtube]
enabled = false

[tunein]
enabled = false

[spotify]
enabled = false
username = ${SPOTIFY_USERNAME}
password = ${SPOTIFY_PASSWORD}
client_id = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_ID}
client_secret = ${SPOTIFY_CLIENT_SECRET}

#!/bin/sh

npm install homebridge-myq
npm install homebridge-nest
npm install homebridge-platform-orbit
